Review Text:
the food is awful, worst of all was the service... I had to resort to serving myself, as they could manage to serve a glass of wine 

Had the steak, garnished with four (4) French fries... didn't even attempt to eat the oyster... otherwise by the smell of it... I'd be off to the pharmacy for some pepto bismol... this place is a joke... when customers have to resort to serving themselves because the waiting staff are so clueless... you know you have problems... and it wasn't even busy, 50% occupancy... at best

AVOID THIS PLACE LIKE I AVOIDED THAT OYSTER!!!!...... HAHAHAHA...OMG

Review Title: Excellent service, exquisite ambience, sophisticated decor and great food
Review Text:
This hidden restaurant is a treasure for those who love fine dining with fantastic food and wine.
Ai muốn cầu hôn thả thính các kiểu thì nên đến đây.
Không gian sang trọng, ấm cúng; trang trí nhẹ nhàng bắt mắt; chất lượng dịch vụ 5*;
Thức ăn tuyệt hảo….

Review Title: Birthday dinner in Ho Chi Minh !
Review Text:
Tucked away in a smaller alley in Ward 6, District 3 in Ho Chi Minh is this unique restaurant. 
I had seen online when home in Australia then when in Ho Chi Minh went a few days earlier to make arrangements re: specifics of what I wanted and paid deposit. 
On arrival all looked as expected. 
We were given menu immediately and needed to make selections for the night as 4 of the 5 courses had choices ! Easy enough . Had to ask for drinks menu and placed our orders and then courses started to arrive . The cake and happy birthday song came out after the first course. After having our final bite of our 3rd course the assistant waiter had our main course signalling the main waiter to take our current plate away to put main course plate down. We then had to ask as our cocktail was finished could he now get us our bottle of wine we had ordered as would obviously like to enjoy with the main course. Pace seemed very rushed . I had to use google translate to get this message across . 
This being said food was very nice . Ambience very was lovely . 
I would definitely recommend for a special occasion. 
It was also in mine opinion excellent value for money . 
The waiter was very attentive to all requests when asked and a great picture taker for all different couples , groups celebrating an event that evening 
Just please don’t rush the food.
Great for romance and love. Very decent food, service is spot on. Would've to lve there in the restaurant...😄😄

Review Text: We went for the new years eve set menu. The food varied from good to average. The steak was very good but small and a third was fat. Service was good but lacked a friendly smile. The courses was served one after another which wasn't pleasant. I expect they had another booking and wanted us out early. The restaurant is decorated well and has a good atmosphere. The food is well presented but half the dishes lacked flavour. I have been lucky to have eaten fine dining around the world and this isn't it. They charged us for a drink we didn't order, so make sure to check the bill.

The food is good
The space is fantastic
I am very surprised cause in a small street there have a warmly restaurant like this
Very good service and reasonable value for the money. Food is just okay.  Nothing remarkable.  Decor is way over the top. Not a favorite

Trải nghiệm đáng nhớ tại nhà hàng, đồ ăn ngon và rất vừa miệng. Cảm ơn sự phục vụ chu đáo nhiệt tình từ Vinh cũng như 2 nghệ sĩ violin đã mang tới một vữa tối tuyệt vời cho vợ chồng tôi
Tôi chắc chắn sẽ quay lại và dĩ nhiên sẽ giới thiệu cho bạn bè tôi đến.
Tuyệt vời!!

Review Title: Looks like to go to a Palace
Review Text: Restaurant has quite special & nice decoration on each floor, not a big restaurant but sure can give you a blink blink feeling ~ !  The presentation of each dish also shows the chef made them with heart. And the waiter also provide a good service to the guests.
Beautiful decorations, good service, waiters/waitresses very nice and professional, dishes all delicious... worth $$ for a warm dinner with your love

we came to this restaurant by friends recommendation.

The foods are fantastic and the ambient is so wonderful 

The owner is jovial and he provide to us a very good recommendation on the restaurant food.

We are so impressed and enjoyed our dinner there so much.

We will definitely come back with more friends again.

Thank for the recommendation
The Little Door was amazingly new fine dining restaurant in Saigon offered very reasonable price. The decoration was nice and the foods, specially Seafood pasta was very tasty.
Không gian đẹp, sang, giá tốt.. rất thích hợp những buổi hẹn hò. Lần đầu đến quán, rất ấn tượng, ngồi gần bàn khách tèo chuyện bằng tiếng Pháp nghe rất thích.

Review Title: Trải nghiệm ẩm thực đa giác quan.
Review Text: Nếu bạn muốn có một số trải nghiệm ẩm thực đích thực trọn vẹn với những người thân yêu, đây là nhà hàng bạn nên ghé thăm. Từ âm nhạc nền nã thư giãn và môi trường sang trọng đắm chìm cùng với cách trang trí tinh tế của những món ăn, bạn sẽ tận hưởng từng khoảnh khắc ẩm thực với các cuộc trò chuyện, tiếng thì thầm diễn ra xung quanh.

If you want some fine dining experience with your loved ones, this is your go to restaurant. From the relaxing music and luxury environment to the delicate decoration of a variety of dishes, you would enjoy every moment and immerse in the food and the conversations!

Thật tuyệt vời cho 1 đêm sinh nhật tại The Litte Door, không gian thích hợp cho một buổi tiệc lãng mạng, Phục vụ nhiệt tình chu đáo, đặc biệt mình rất thích món Cơm Gà Cay ở nơi này...mọi thứ thật hoàn hảo.

Excellent restaurant... I have frequented many many restaurants in Hochiminh and I have to say this is number one in fine dining for special occasions.  The food is excellent, staff friendly and they make your special day truly special.

Review Title: Amazing Small European oasis in Ho Chi Minh city
Review Text: Great, Cosy place with European atmosphere in the city center of Ho Chi Minh city. Nice music, amazing food, perfect service. 100% enjoy!

walking by the the little door and didn't pay much attention until came inside. the restaurant was well arranged and the table set up was so romantic.

I ordered foie gras as introduced by staff and found He was  right. it was ready to melt in your mouth. The rib eye was so well cooked at medium and so juicy and tender. one of my best experience so far for how steaks tasted.

strongly recommend.

Came here with friends for the first time and was so surprised with The Little Door.
❤️ Nice and well set up with romantic theme.
❤️ Heartfelt welcome service by staffs.
❤️Amazing tender and juicy steaks and truffle pasta.
Should come back often.
Came here with friends for dinner and really enjoyed the service here. The staffs were nice and the foods were delicious, specially steaks here.

I was surprised to experience such delicious foods here. It looks not a fancy one from ouside bit when you entered inside like you had entered the different world - romance and romance.

The foods were so delicious and 100% home made here. I really like this restaurant.

Review Title: quán dễ thương, đồ en siêu ngon
Review Text: Được nhỏ bạn giới thiệu đồ ăn ở đây ngon lắm, quả thực không sai. mình gọi món bò striploin, giá buổi trưa chỉ có 250K++/ phần (tối giá 350K++) bò mềm và mọng nước. chưa bao giờ ăn miếng bò ngon như vậy. quán trang trí siêu lãng mạn!
